column6: CODE RED PART 3 The battle of the Reds rages on. The crimson giants cut a bloody swath across the Marvel Universe in one of Hulk's most action packed adventures yet!
column8: | letterer:Comicraft | letterer:Chris Giarrusso | inker:Dario Brizuela | inker:Mark Farmer | penciller:Ian Churchill | writer:Jeph Loeb | colorist:Peter Steigerweld
